description:
Shirt from the Tommy Jeans collection. The model is made of smooth fabric. Has a classic collar.
      - Regular cut.
      - Soft classic Kent collar.
      - Button fastening.
      - Thin, inflexible fabric.
      - Collar circumference: 40.5 cm.
      - Sleeve length: 67 cm.
      - Length: 78 cm.
      - Armpit width: 54 cm.
      - Shoulder width: 42.5 cm.
      - Dimensions for size: M.

      Pattern: smooth
      Cut: slim
      Cut: regular
      Material: cotton
      Collar: classic
      Collar: soft
      Occasions: casual
      Composition: 100% Cotton

Shirt from the Armani Exchange collection. The model is made of smooth fabric. Has an Italian collar.

    - Simple cut.
    - Button fastening.
    - Sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
    - Smooth fabric.

    Pattern: smooth
    Cut: regular
    Collar: soft
    Occasions: casual
    Collar: Italian
